item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, January 25, 2025 at 5:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Arsenal FC AI Research Engineer Job Posting (55 points | 36 comments)
2. Show HN: I built a DIY plane spotting system at home (68 points | 10 comments)
3. Liberux Nexx: Linux smartphone (found on Galaxus, Swiss online reseller) (16 points | 9 comments)
4. I got OpenAI o1 to play the boardgame Codenames and it's super good (116 points | 62 comments)
5. Pixelfed Hit 500K Users (140 points | 24 comments)
6. Open Heart Protocol (23 points | 4 comments)
7. How to build your own ZX80/ZX81 (2019) (47 points | 14 comments)
8. An overview of gradient descent optimization algorithms (2016) (87 points | 12 comments)
9. The Mythical IO-Bound Rails App (92 points | 16 comments)
10. How far can you get in 40 minutes from each subway station in NYC? (135 points | 76 comments)
11. Life lessons from the first half-century of my career (265 points | 80 comments)
12. Doorbell camera catches rare footage of meteorite striking home's front walkway (47 points | 25 comments)
13. Hacker infects 18,000 "script kiddies" with fake malware builder (84 points | 34 comments)
14. Show HN: Cs16.css – CSS library based on Counter Strike 1.6 UI (729 points | 120 comments)
15. Advent of Code 2024 and BQN (42 points | 5 comments)
16. Inboxbooster (YC W17) Is Hiring ( | hide)
17. Do Russians Support the War in Ukraine? (8 points | discuss)
18. TinyZero (159 points | 23 comments)
19. Show HN: Trolling SMS spammers with Ollama (261 points | 97 comments)
20. Ask HN: Moving a not-for-profit web app off AWS (16 points | 25 comments)
21. Show HN: Using YOLO to Detect Office Chairs in 40M Hotel Photos (187 points | 99 comments)
22. IEEE Credentialing Program (7 points | discuss)
23. File Explorer is merged to Helix editor (202 points | 26 comments)
24. Show HN: Habby – A straightforward bullet journal with habit tracking (36 points | 8 comments)
25. Wild – A fast linker for Linux (350 points | 171 comments)
26. Show HN: Lightpanda, an open-source headless browser in Zig (263 points | 124 comments)
27. A phishing attack involving g.co, Google's URL shortener (329 points | 138 comments)
28. Show HN: Krita RGBA Tech – Exploring Filter Engines in Open-Source Art (4 points | discuss)
29. The FizzBuzz that did not get me the job (331 points | 281 comments)
30. Snowdrop OS – a homebrew operating system from scratch, in assembly language (271 points | 59 comments)
